hero.description: Advanced analytics and tools for Intervals.icu users. Deep dive into your data with our free suite of professional metrics.

power.title: Power Analysis
power.desc: Deep dive into your critical power and anaerobic work capacity.

fatigue.title: Fatigue Monitor
fatigue.desc: Track chronic training load to optimize your form.

intervals.title: Intervals
intervals.desc: Automated detection and classification of efforts.

progress.title: Progress

zones.desc: Analyze time in zones to ensure training compliance.

donation.description: DeepMetric Lite is and always will be free. Your support helps keep the servers running and contributes to the ecosystem.
